item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, September 16, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. How to Succeed in Mr Beast Production (Leaked PDF) (1523 points | 950 comments)
2. Fair: A Go library for serving resources fairly (90 points | 14 comments)
3. The Waterfall Model was a straw man argument from the beginning (2015) (34 points | 28 comments)

8. Fractran: Computer architecture based on the multiplication of fractions (9 points | 1 comment)
9. D&D is Anti-Medieval (73 points | 82 comments)
10. g1: Using Llama-3.1 70B on Groq to create o1-like reasoning chains (250 points | 97 comments)

13. Plain Text Accounting (PTA) (217 points | 72 comments)
14. The First HTML LSP That Reports Syntax Errors (162 points | 45 comments)

20. I give you feedback on your blog post draft but you don't send it to me (2021) (156 points | 55 comments)
21. CSSnano (78 points | 24 comments)
22. Tell HN: DanBC has died (397 points | 65 comments)
23. The HTTP Query Method (14 points | 2 comments)

26. Jensen's Inequality as an Intuition Tool (2021) (86 points | 20 comments)
27. Amazon's Secret Weapon in Chip Design Is Amazon (59 points | 23 comments)
28. Why Scrum is stressing you out (287 points | 263 comments)
29. Byte Ordering: On Holy Wars and a Plea for Peace (1980) (57 points | 66 comments)
